attributes.action: The government to step in and address this situation around rip off energy!
attributes.additional_details: Stop these energy companies from ripping the UK public off by fixing the price of energy to 5-10% above wholesale price.
attributes.background: The government should be stepping in and strip ofgem and the energy firms in the uk of ripping off uk households. Most of this money due to foreign ownership is leaving the UK and going to France and Germany

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621874
